In 2024, 27 houses are scheduled to be renovated in the Volzhsky

Ludmila Dmitrieva♪26.12.2023 at 09:280
In 2024, 27 multi-family housing units are planned to be renovated in the Volj Capital Programme. It's a lot of stories in the new and old parts of the city. According to the Wolzh's Truth in the mayor's press service, there will be a list of objects to be renovated...
Find out more.

Electrical disengagement in the Volj on 26 December affected 9 houses

Sergei Borodin♪25.12.2023 at 12:570
Electricity in a number of houses will be temporarily cut off in the city of Volj on 26 December 2023. Let's get the addresses and the time when there's no light. According to the Wolzh's Truth at Volgogradble Electric, breaks in the transmission of electricity...
Find out more.

The Volga continues to conclude contracts for the maintenance of gas equipment

Ludmila Dmitrieva♪25.12.2023 at 09:320
The staff of the Wolzhsky City Livelihood Committee, together with representatives of the gas distribution organization, company managers and TSW, discussed changes in the maintenance of domestic and in-house gas equipment. According to the "Wold Truth" in the mayor's press service...
Find out more.

CFC service tariffs were installed in Volgograd province in 2024

Sergei Borodin♪20.12.2023 at 17:360
Tariffs for basic public services are installed at the Volgograd oblast Tariff Regulatory Committee. They will enter into force on 1 July 2024. According to the " Wolzh's truth " in the Volgograd State press service, electricity charges with...
Find out more.

The Wolzhsky changed the deadline for admission of records in December 2023

Sergei Borodin♪20.12.2023 in 08:010
The Wolzhian heat networks warn the Wizards to change the response dates. The correspondent of the " Volge Truth " refers to the press service of the resource organization. In December 2023, individual records will be validated from 21...
Find out more.

The Law on Payment of FCC without a pensioner commission will enter into force in 2024

Sergei Borodin♪19.12.2023 at 14:300
The President of the Russian Federation, Vladimir Putin, has signed a law which abolishes the banking commissions from the mandatory payment of the LHC for pensioners and a number of concessionaires. According to the TAS, the commission will not take charge of the payment of public services and payment...
Find out more.

The control department of the mayor of the Volzhsky checks the quality of snow cleaning

Elena Belousov♪19.12.2023 at 09:020
During the past week, the staff of the Wolzhsky Administration Control Office conducted several raids, during which the quality of the snow cleaning of urban areas was checked. That's what the correspondent of the Wolzh Truth reports on the city's press service. C...
Find out more.

Vadim Homenko, head of the Vulgian Housing Authority

Elena Belousov♪18.12.2023 at 18:290
On Monday, 18 December, at an expanded meeting with the heads of the mayor ' s structural units, the acting head of the city, Alexei Matzaev, presented Wadim Homenko as head of the Housing and Social Security Directorate...
Find out more.

Electricity disconnections are expected from the residents of the Volge 18-19 December

Sergei Borodin♪18.12.2023 in 08:010
Electricity in a number of houses will be temporarily cut off in the city of Volj on 18 and 19 December 2023. Let's get the addresses and the time when there's no light. According to the Wolzh's Truth at Volgogradble Electric, breaks...
Find out more.

Where to complain in the Volgeska, unless they clean the snow in the yard.

Ivan Novikov♪14.12.2023 at 10:310
On Wednesday, 13 December, the heavenly office, perhaps for the first time for this winter, checked how the wolves are ready to clean the snow. The company ' s technology was on the road, and the yards from the snow were cleaning the UK. Like they said tonight...
Find out more.
